title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 19 ยง 260.4 - Submission of notices
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 19 ยง 260.4 - Submission of notices

State Regulations
(a) In all
instances, an agency must submit the proper notice with applicable
attachments. (b) Rule making
notices should be e-filed via the department's website. (c) Non rule making notices may be e-mailed, hand-delivered or mailed. (1)

Hand-delivered
or mailed notices must be delivered to the Division of Administrative Rules, NYS Department of State, One Commerce Plaza, 99 Washington Avenue, Suite 650, Albany, NY 12231-0001. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes
R. & Regs. Tit. 19
ยง
260.4

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
